message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You're lowballing me! I want a bigger share.
You're not offering me enough. I want a bigger share, too!
Meet me in the middle. This is a fair offer.
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
Still too low. I think I can get a better deal if we keep negotiating.
I'm willing to compromise. This is my best offer so far.
I'm starting to get impatient. You're not taking me seriously with these lowball offers.
I'm not falling for it. You're just trying to get me to accept a bad deal. I'll keep pushing for a better offer.
I'm getting closer to what I think is a fair share. Will you meet me here?
I'm not going to back down. You need to meet me at 60/40 or I'll walk away.
I'm not going to give in to your ultimatum. I think I can get a better deal if we keep negotiating.
I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share.
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'm taking control of the negotiation.
You're not taking control, you're just trying to strong-arm me. I'm not going to accept such a lopsided deal.
I'm making one last push for a fair deal. This is my best offer.
It's now or never. Take it or leave it.
No way. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept such an unfair deal.
